text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea rotundifolia (also called Light Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree endemic to Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea rotundifolia". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31927A9669358. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31927A9669358.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
